review: It's a really good app, but with some odd limitations, which kind of need to be fixed. 1: You cant trim your videos, sure there's a timer, but there's almost no way you can count out the exact amount of seconds you're going to need, it would be easier with trim. 2: If you see a video that says, "due...Full ReviewIt's a really good app, but with some odd limitations, which kind of need to be fixed. 1: You cant trim your videos, sure there's a timer, but there's almost no way you can count out the exact amount of seconds you're going to need, it would be easier with trim. 2: If you see a video that says, "duetthis" you can't see if anyone has duetted it, and you cant search for a specific video, only hashtags. 3: you can't see when a video was posted.

If you are having trouble, you probably do not know how to use TikTok. It is very simple and you can research. You must be 12+ to have an account. The content is directed to an older audience, so please get parent/guardian permission first. Some videos go against the community guidelines, so if ther...Full ReviewIf you are having trouble, you probably do not know how to use TikTok. It is very simple and you can research. You must be 12+ to have an account. The content is directed to an older audience, so please get parent/guardian permission first. Some videos go against the community guidelines, so if there is a blank screen on your video with the TikTok symbol on it, it has been taken down. You must have 1000 fans to go live, but there are people who can report the livestream/account and take it down.
